front.title: Coexistence between Version 1, Version 2, and Version 3 of the Internet-standard Network Management Framework
front.abstract: The purpose of this document is to describe coexistence between version 3 of the Internet-standard Network Management Framework, (SNMPv3), version 2 of the Internet-standard Network Management Framework (SNMPv2), and the original Internet-standard Network Management Framework (SNMPv1). [STANDARDS-TRACK]
